sen.j: 綾小路通（あやのこうじどおり）は京都市内の東西の通りの一つ。
sen.e: Ayanokoji-dori Street is one of the streets at east and west in Kyoto City.
Ayanokoji-dori Street is a street running east-west through Kyoto City.
Ayanokoji-dori Street is a street running east-west through Kyoto City.

sen.j: 東は寺町通から西は天神川通の二筋西まで、四条通と仏光寺通の間を通る。
sen.e: This street runs between Shijo-dori Street and Bukkoji-dori Street, from Teramachi dori Street at east to two streets west on Tenjingawa-dori Street at west.
The street runs between Shijo-dori Street and Bukkoji-dori Street, from Teramachi dori Street in the east to two streets west on Tenjingawa-dori Street.
The street runs between Shijo-dori Street and Bukkoji-dori Street, from Teramachi dori Street in the east to two streets west on Tenjingawa-dori Street.

sen.j: 途中西小路通の西で四条中学校により分断されている。
sen.e: On the way, the street is divided at Shijo Junior High School on Nishikoji-dori Street at west.
On the way, the street is divided by Nishikoji-dori Street in the west around Shijo Junior High School.
On the way, the street is divided by Nishikoji-dori Street in the west around Shijo Junior High School.

sen.j: 平安京の綾小路にあたる。
sen.e: This street used to be Ayanokoji in Heiankyo.
This street used to be Ayanokoji in Heiankyo.
This street used to be Ayanokoji in Heiankyo.

sen.j: 京都市指定文化財の杉本家住宅をはじめ、裕福な商人の多かった通りである。
sen.e: Many wealthy business people used live on this street that begin with the Sugimoto Residence which is the Kyoto City Designated Cultural Asset.
Many wealthy business people used to live on this street, beginning with the Sugimoto Residence which is a Kyoto City Designated Cultural Asset.
Many wealthy business people used to live on this street, beginning with the Sugimoto Residence which is a Kyoto City Designated Cultural Asset.

sen.j: 坊城通下ルに壬生寺、新選組壬生屯所跡がある。
sen.e: There is the Mibu-dera Temple and the remain of Mibu Tonsho of Shinsengumi on Bojo-dori sagaru.
The Mibu-dera Temple and the remains of Mibu Tonsho of Shinsengumi on Bojo-dori sagaru are located on this street.
The Mibu-dera Temple and the remains of Mibu Tonsho of Shinsengumi on Bojo-dori sagaru are located on this street.

sen.j: 京都市営地下鉄烏丸線（四条駅 (京都市営地下鉄)）
